post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since ~11 months (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

The following offer is a special for our LET friends, the 512GIGNL is not listed on our website.

> 512GIGNL (Netherlands)
512MB RAM Guaranteed
25GB HD
500GB BW @ 1gb/s
1 ipv4 + 5 ipv6
$4.99/month 
FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: https://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=49

> 1024GIGNL (Netherlands)
1024MB RAM Guaranteed
50GB HD
1,000GB BW @ 1gb/s
1 ipv4 + 5 ipv6
$7/month - (was $15/month!)
Use coupon:  LET-G6CI6UNY5Z
FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=42

**Free Addons Pack : Get 10GB of space + DNS (more info on the plans page)**

**DirectAdmin License available : $5/month**

**5 days money back guarantee, no BS :)**

Locations/Test IPs/Test Files: http://myrsk.com/network.php 
(Above Plan Offer is at our NL location)

Setup time might vary depending on verification of new accounts, and stock.
